status.info: We have gotten this protocol to work successfully, but haven't needed to repeat it recently.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3sgf","text":"Remove the radioactive-herbicide treated leaf from the plant and wash in   of 10% MEOH or ACN plus 0.25% NIS using the vortex mixer in a 20 ml scintillation vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"6A8CDF60B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pf74","text":"Remove treated leaf from the scintillation vial and combine with the remaining shoot tissue. Add   of scintillation cocktail and count the leaf wash to determine % absorption. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6r0dk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fvg1n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"7A7F0E70B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3hkq9","text":"You will need this number to calculate the mass balance.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tc8j","text":"Use liquid nitrogen to grind whole plants with a glass rod in a 10mL disposable glass test tube. {"blocks":[{"key":"c70q3","text":"Add   of extraction buffer, grind tissue with glass rod.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c16ni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"B46E7260B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8sac","text":"Add all   of extraction buffer and plant solution to 0.45um Ciro Nylon Maxi-Spin Filter Tubes. Add   +   of extraction solution to the original glass tube for rinsing and add rinsate to tube (total solution volume:  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":99,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":103,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":215,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"BDF939F0B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"C5522D60B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"CA2A6960B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"CE27FCD0B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"guhg","text":"Remove   into a scintillation vial for counting on the Liquid Scintillation Counter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dn1s5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"D54A28D0B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vd6a","text":"Centrifuge the Ciro tube at ~  to separate liquid from ground plant material.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"26cjb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"4700","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DB70DDD0B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1g1n0","text":"(Dispose of radioactive 10 mL glass vial â save cap to wash)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tpsj","text":"Ensure that the liquid herbicide extract was properly acidified before you run it through the C18 SPE column by testing it with litmus paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j7la","text":"Rinse the filter component of the Ciro tube with   extraction buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"441p4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"EDFD66D0B64111ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34cor","text":"Remove the entire filter component to dry in an envelope in the drying oven. When it is dry, carefully remove the filter papers and plant material. Before oxidizing these components to count radiation, these samples may be stored at -20C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"109l6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o12t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hf94","text":"Remove   from oxidizer solution and run on the Liquid Scintillation Counter, or count entire oxidizer solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"68apl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"068723D0B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqe8n","text":"Set up vacuum manifold for extraction. Place one Sep-Pak C18 filter on the manifold, and a glass syringe on the Sep-Pak filter. Place 2 labeled glass tubes adjacent to each other in the test tube holder for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50tt6","text":"Precondition the C-18 column with ~  of 100% ACN.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"15C34950B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2kdg3","text":"Pour the extraction buffer in the Circo tube through the C18 SPE column for each sample. Rinse the Ciro tube with X mL of acidified water to make the volume up to  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":163,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8657d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"1B84ACD0B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1j3r6","text":"Switch the vacuum manifold over to the new, labeled tube. Run   100% ACN through the vacuum manifold to extract fluroxypyr-ester, fluorxypyr-acid and fluroxypyr-metabolites ffrom the column.   +  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":191,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":195,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"la7d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"211B56D0B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"24672670B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"26259F50B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3kba","text":"Place these samples in the hood   to allow ACN to evaporate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1osta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"2B8DE650B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24ac2","text":"When the samples are evaporated, bring the solution back up in HPLC solvent A and vortex several time to re-suspend everything in the test tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6st3","text":"Filter the solution through a nylon syringe filter to filter out any particulates. Inject filtrate into a small liquid vial for use with the HPLC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45r3u","text":"Take a   subsample before injecting the sample into the HPLC . This will allow you to determine the ratio of parent compound (fluroxypyr-ester) to metabolites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqg7r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"3D34F150B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qln3","text":"Collect   from the pulled liquid and count on the Liquid Scintillation Counter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bckms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"1D9F0150B64211ED8B194DFDCAA409B2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
